page.title: 06CLUB OR SHOPPING CENTRE.
page.content: The 16-65 Centre in Hill St. has been providing a range of activities including a youth club.There are trips and holidays at a reasonable price.Most of the boys who use the club go there to BREAKDANCE which is the latest craze in 1985.The girls enjoy listening to the juke-box or playing table-tennis.Sadly the club may be knocked down so a shopping centre can be built.It is possible that the club could find other premises such as the Queen's Girls'School building which will become empty in 1986 when the secondary schools in Wisbech reorganise.If the club can move there then the people of Wisbech will be able to benefit from a new shopping centre and a great youth club.
